long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Step into the elegant world of Mitsuri Kanroji from Demon Slayer with vibrant, dynamic visuals.

🎨 Minimalist Design: A delicate and clean interface reflecting Mitsuri's grace and strength.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date with a beautifully styled display.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy Mitsuri Kanroji-themed games directly from your shortcuts.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Search efficiently with the engine of your choice.
🚀 More Extension: Unlock features to enhance your browsing with Mitsuri's charm.
